title: Sweet and Lovely
text:
"Sweet and Lovely" is an American <a href="popular%20song">popular song</a> of 1931, composed by <a href="Gus%20Arnheim">Gus Arnheim</a>, <a href="Charles%20N.%20Daniels%20%28music%29">Charles N. Daniels</a>, and <a href="Harry%20Tobias">Harry Tobias</a>.
Recordings of the song which charted in 1931 are:
